Detailed Description

Implementation of the templated subStage, Trim Chunk Exposure, of the Instrument Signature Removal stage forthe nightly LSST Image Processing Pipeline.

Author:
Nicole M. Silvestri, University of Washington
Contact: nms@astro.washington.edu
